text: The 1957 Fresno State Bulldogs football team represented Fresno State CollegeCalifornia State University, Fresno was known as Fresno State College from 1949 to 1971. during the 1957 NCAA College Division football season. The team was led by sixth-year head coach Clark Van Galder and played home games at Ratcliffe Stadium on the campus of Fresno City College in Fresno, California. They finished the season with a record of five wins and five losses (5–5, 1–1 CCAA). ==Schedule== ==Team players in the NFL== The following were selected in the 1958 NFL Draft. {|class="wikitable" width="65%" |- align="center" style="background:#A81933;color:#FFFFFF;" | Player || Position || Round || Overall || NFL team |- align="center" bgcolor="" | Dean Philpott || Fullback || 11 || 122 || Chicago Cardinals |} ==Notes== ==References== Fresno State Category:Fresno State Bulldogs football seasons Fresno State Bulldogs f
